attributes.action: Stop Delaying the Counting of Ballot papers for 3 Days .
attributes.background: 23rd May we will be voting in the Eu Elections . The votes should be counted immediately after the closure of voting . And NOT 3 Days after .

rejection.details:
Although the European elections in the UK take place on Thursday 23 May. The European elections take place across the EU on 23-26 May 2019.

Counting is done on a country-by-country basis and results are kept secret until all voting is finished. They will be announced from 22:00 pm on 26 May.

The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for when the elections outside the UK take place or when the counting of ballot papers takes place. 

You can find out more about the EU elections here:

www.election-results.eu
